dict.acceptation: 商品，货物；动产；本领；合意的人；

sent.orig: Hubble Space Telescope image of the GOODS survey.
sent.trans: 哈勃太空望远镜的GOODS巡天照片。

sent.orig: This approach provides most flexible and most efficient way of working with GOODS database.
sent.trans: 这种存储方式为我们提供了使用GOODS数据库最灵活也是最有效的方式。

sent.orig: Suitable for long goods, circle goods, plate goods and irregular shape goods.
sent.trans: 适用于存放长物料、环行物料、板材和不规则货物，托臂可以是单面或双面。

sent.orig: Add realize goods, browse the goods, to locate the goods, modify the goods, cargo delete function.
sent.trans: 实现添加货物、浏览货物、查找货物、修改货物、删除货物的功能。

sent.orig: Be strict to follow up the warehouse procedure about goods receiving goods keeping and goods shipping.
sent.trans: 严格遵守仓库的操作程序，进行货物的收发和保存。
